description: The initiative focuses on creating systemic change within the food production and distribution sectors, particularly in Montreal and Quebec. The organization, co-founded by two women, aims to support food businesses and address food insecurity by co-creating solutions with various stakeholders, including producers, municipalities, and community organizations. The organization operates with an ecosystemic approach, emphasizing collaboration and listening to the needs of all actors involved in the food system. They provide a range of services, including consulting, skills development, and the implementation of innovative solutions, such as an IT platform for managing food coupon programs.
name: Collectif Recolte
